It's currently hard to insert to emoji into RMarkdown documents. The emo(ji) package makes it very easy: `r emo::ji("smile")`

```{r}
emo::ji("smile")
emo::ji("moon")
```

You can either supply a name (unique) or a keyword (not unique). If you supply a keyword, emo::ji will will randomly pick from the options.
